title: Gaming Tokens IMX, SAND and AXS Plunge Following Bitcoin Flash Crash
description: Immutable, The Sandbox, Axie Infinity, and Gala tokens dropped 8-15%, facing deeper losses after Bitcoin’s dip.

title: Bitcoin Ordinals Upgrade Could Create a Centralized Fork, Says BRC-20 Creator
description: The latest drama in Bitcoin inscriptions swirls around the BRC-20 protocol, which allows the creation of meme coins.

title: Why is the crypto market down today?
description:
The crypto market is down today as the impact of large liquidations temporarily shakes traders’ bullish confidence.

The crypto market is down today after a sharp correction hit Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH) and altcoins on Jan. 3. Bitcoin price dropped by 10%, nearly erasing all 2024 gains, before rounding to trade near $42,700.

Let’s take a closer look at the factors impacting Bitcoin price today.

Investors’ belief that the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) could approve one of the 14 outstanding spot Bitcoin ETF applications in early January sent BTC price over $45,000.

Read more

title: Bloomberg analyst queries Matrixport’s Bitcoin ETF potential rejection claim
description:
Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchuna questioned the veracity of a Matrixport report that claimed that the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) might reject several pending applications for a spot Bitcoin ETF. “At this point, saying SEC rejecting it isn’t just going against James Seyffart and I like it was in the early days, now you basically […]

The post Bloomberg analyst queries Matrixport’s Bitcoin ETF potential rejection claim appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ordinals founder addresses Bitcoin maxis complaints
description: In recent discussions within the Bitcoin community, Casey Rodarmor, the developer behind the Ordinals protocol, has addressed concerns raised by ideological Bitcoin maximalists regarding the protocol’s use of block space. The Ordinals protocol facilitates the embedding of inscriptions and media directly on the Bitcoin blockchain, sparking debates about its impact and potential hard fork within […]

title: Charles Hoskinson engages in Bitcoin ETF dialogue with Peter Schiff
description: Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, and Peter Schiff, a well-known Bitcoin critic, have publicly voiced contrasting views on the matter. This debate is occurring against the backdrop of the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) considering the approval of such an ETF, which has significant implications for the cryptocurrency market. Charles Hoskinson addresses […]

title: Lightning network credited with Bitcoin’s surging use
description: In recent market research conducted by Kaminari, the increased use of Bitcoin as a transactional layer has been attributed, in part, to the growing adoption of the Lightning Network (LN) by crypto platforms. The study reveals that Bitcoin’s transactional activity has experienced steady growth, with 40 million transactions settled in Q3 of 2023, indicating a […]

title: ApeX reports 203% gains amid market downturn
description: According to CoinGecko data, ApeX, the token behind the decentralized derivatives protocol, was reported as the top gainer on Jan. 3.

title: Cardano (ADA) Surges with Double Digit Volume Gains in 2024
description: Cardano (ADA) has started the year strong with positive price performance and trading volumes reaching record highs. Crypto investors are optimistic about a strong year based on promised network developments and positive technical indications. Cardano (ADA) was one of the most closely watched coins in 2023, and it continues to impress investors into the new [...]
